spec_data.Name: fabric
spec_data.Description:
Fabric is a simple Pythonic remote deployment tool which is designed to upload
files to, and run shell commands on, a number of servers in parallel or
serially.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:16:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple Pythonic remote deployment tool
